DAMP_URL_PREFIX.description: The URL prefix to use for the DAMP instance (i.e. "/DAMP")

DAMP_USER.description: The username for basic auth. DAMP_PASS must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_PASS.description: The password for basic auth. DAMP_USER must also be set if used. Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_PROXY_USER.description: The username of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_PROXY_PASS.description: The password of the proxy server. Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_PROXY_TYPE.description: The type of the proxy server. For example "socks5". Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_PROXY_LOC.description: The location of the proxy server (host or ip). Leave empty to disable.

DAMP_ALT_TW.description: The site to use as a replacement for twitter.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_YT.description: The site to use as a replacement for youtube.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_IG.description: The site to use as a replacement for instagram.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_RD.description: The site to use as a replacement for reddit.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_MD.description: The site to use as a replacement for medium.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_TL.description: The Google Translate alternative to use for all searches following the 'translate ___' structure.

DAMP_ALT_IMG.description: The site to use as a replacement for imgur.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_WIKI.description: The site to use as a replacement for wikipedia.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_IMDB.description: The site to use as a replacement for imdb.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_ALT_QUORA.description: The site to use as a replacement for quora.com when site alternatives are enabled in the config.

DAMP_MINIMAL.description: Remove everything except basic result cards from all search queries (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_COUNTRY.description: [CONFIG] The country to use for restricting search results (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/DAMP-search/develop/app/static/settings/countries.json)

DAMP_CONFIG_LANGUAGE.description: [CONFIG] The language to use for the interface (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/DAMP-search/develop/app/static/settings/languages.json)

DAMP_CONFIG_SEARCH_LANGUAGE.description: [CONFIG] The language to use for search results (use values from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benbusby/DAMP-search/develop/app/static/settings/languages.json)

DAMP_CONFIG_DISABLE.description: [CONFIG] Disable ability for client to change config (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_BLOCK.description: [CONFIG] Block websites from search results (comma-separated list)

DAMP_CONFIG_SAFE.description: [CONFIG] Use safe mode for searches (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_ALTS.description: [CONFIG] Use social media alternatives (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_NEAR.description: [CONFIG] Restrict results to only those near a particular city

DAMP_CONFIG_TOR.description: [CONFIG] Use Tor, if available (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_NEW_TAB.description: [CONFIG] Always open results in new tab (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_VIEW_IMAGE.description: [CONFIG] Enable View Image option (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_GET_ONLY.description: [CONFIG] Search using GET requests only (set to 1 or leave blank)

DAMP_CONFIG_STYLE.description: [CONFIG] Custom CSS styling (paste in CSS or leave blank)
DAMP_CONFIG_STYLE.value: :root { /* LIGHT THEME COLORS */ --DAMP-background: #d8dee9; --DAMP-accent: #2e3440; --DAMP-text: #3B4252; --DAMP-contrast-text: #eceff4; --DAMP-secondary-text: #70757a; --DAMP-result-bg: #fff; --DAMP-result-title: #4c566a; --DAMP-result-url: #81a1c1; --DAMP-result-visited: #a3be8c; /* DARK THEME COLORS */ --DAMP-dark-background: #222; --DAMP-dark-accent: #685e79; --DAMP-dark-text: #fff; --DAMP-dark-contrast-text: #000; --DAMP-dark-secondary-text: #bbb; --DAMP-dark-result-bg: #000; --DAMP-dark-result-title: #1967d2; --DAMP-dark-result-url: #4b11a8; --DAMP-dark-result-visited: #bbbbff; }
